data.title: Official EA Site
data.meta_description: Whether you’re at the start of your career, mid-career, or looking forward to retirement, EA provides benefits that support your needs and can help you balance your career and personal life.
data.text:
Every day is more fun when your work is play. But there are still a lot of things that we take very seriously. Our people, their growth and development, and their well-being are what matter most at Electronic Arts.

What we offer

A lot of companies say their people come first. Here are the ways we demonstrate that they do.

What makes the difference

Our culture is what sets us apart in both the tech and gaming worlds. Here are just a few things we believe in, and hope you do, too.

Our Impact Report

At Electronic Arts, we’re committed to making a positive, lasting impact and are honored to share the incredible progress our teams across the globe have made where we live, work, and play.

Our Awards

We want to be the best Electronic Arts we can be, and we want our employees to do the best work of their careers here. Our award-winning teams have a lot to be proud of!
